Subject: Neo Beast Wars  letter to the Council. Really Long
Date: Sat, 02 Dec 2000 02:44:35 -0000
Mime-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed
Message-ID: <F118zkXhNNIYMwpPzww00009967@...>
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 02 Dec 2000 02:44:35.0872 (UTC) FILETIME=[CEB3BA00:01C05C09]
From: "RYO D" <striderzero1@...>

((First off I am sorry to all the RPG Players to have to waste your time 
with this garbage. But this is one of those things that has to be done I am 
again sorry.))

Dear, Yanshosh, KSL, JP, and Talon.


                As all of you know I decided to take on the task of 
repairing the Ark. My Team of 8 rogues ((That will hereby be referred to as 
the Wild Cats.)) have been working around the clock nonstop at this point 
have put in 240 hours of work each. ((Counting Saturday this is not going to 
be a word problem but that�s the only way I can explain it.)) I am not 
finished and have some more work to do. I want to put the Ark in space with 
the Autobots in it when I finished. But a member of the Council says I must 
have the Decepticons or this will not be allowed as well. I contesting that 
statement he expects the Wild Cats to defeat the Predacon army. In order to 
find out from Hellbeast were the Decepticons are that cannot be accomplished 
without extreme moding. When I did explain that point he stated launching 
the Ark is illegal. Based on the mobile base rule that might be waved if I 
was willing to get the Decepticons from Hellbeast. The mobile base rule 
reads:

Since there have been no mobile bases in the Beast Wars, and also since 
mobile bases give an unfair tactical advantage (and often lead to moding), 
mobile bases (any mobile craft other than a transport pod, one-person 
transport ship, or something to that extent is considered a base and is 
subject to this rule) are not allowed.

I do not consider the Ark a Mobile base on the grounds of when launched the 
only thing in it is going to be the Autobots and teltran 1. The Ark is a 
piece of Autobot history and I�m trying to save it. If anything the ark in 
that state is mobile transport and the Decepticons are in Hellbeast's care. 
I don't think its fare to the Wild Cats and there owner ((Ryo)) to make him 
leave the Ark in that position after that many hour of work because one 
person things it will make his job easier at the cost of someone else.  Base 
is defined as a point of operations none of the Wild Cats will be operating 
out the Ark once it is launched into space so it not a mobile base it is 
more of a Transport shuttle for more than the usual number of passengers.

((It is 3:33 A.M. were I am longing a days rest and I broke a bone in my 
foot training so between the pain killers and the lack of sleep please 
excuse my less than perfect grammar and the lack of vulgar profanity my 
normal letters have.))

                                                                             
                                   Ryo.
